movie.title: United Passions
movie.plot: An epic, untold story that brings to life the inspiring saga of the World Cup and the three determined men who created it. Driven by their vision and passion, three men, overcame their doubts and fought obstacles and scandals to make the World Cup a reality. Spanning the tumultuous 20th Century, this timeless saga celebrates the event that became the most popular sporting event in the world.

events.title: the 19th Amendment to the US Constitution, giving women the right to vote, is passed

movie.title: Iron Jawed Angels
movie.plot: Defiant young activists take the women's suffrage movement by storm, putting their lives at risk to help American women win the right to vote.
movie.awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 27 nominations.

movie.title: The Spirit of St. Louis
movie.plot: Charles 'Slim' Lindbergh struggles to finance and design an airplane that will make his New York to Paris flight the first solo transatlantic crossing.

events.title: Adolf Eichmann is flown out of Buenos Aires to Israel

movie.title: Operation Finale
movie.plot: In 1960, a team of Israeli secret agents is deployed to find Adolf Eichmann, the infamous Nazi architect of the Holocaust, supposedly hidden in Argentina, and get him to Israel to be judged.

movie.title: Conviction
movie.plot: When Betty Anne Waters' older brother Kenny is arrested for murder and sentenced to life in 1983, Betty Anne, a Massachusetts wife and mother of two, dedicates her life to overturning the murder conviction. Convinced that her brother is innocent, Betty Anne puts herself through high school, college and, finally, law school in an 18 year quest to free Kenny. With the help of best friend Abra Rice, Betty Anne pores through suspicious evidence mounted by small town cop Nancy Taylor, meticulously retracing the steps that led to Kenny's arrest. Belief in her brother - and her quest for the truth - pushes Betty Anne and her team to uncover the facts and utilize DNA evidence with the hope of exonerating Kenny.

movie.plot: An Indian intelligence agent journeys to a war-torn coastal island to break a resolute rebel group and meets a passionate journalist.

events.title: John Bunting, Robert Wagner and James Vlassakis are arrested

movie.title: Snowtown
movie.plot: Based on true events, 16 year-old Jamie falls in with his mother's new boyfriend and his crowd of self-appointed neighborhood watchmen, a relationship that leads to a spree of torture and murder.
